info.name: Hype Machine Player Enhancer
info.description:
Don't you hate:
* having to mouse over the player to see the progress bar?
* having to aim with your mouse on the progress bar because it's so small?

Well, install this script then! Persistent progress bar that's 3x fatter. So convenient!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 3

lightened the seeker bg

Version 2

made the bar 3x fatter

Version 1

forces display:block on the timebar div on all hypem.com urls
